boat.full_description:
A Yarmouth 23, launched in 2001, 'Freya' was taken by road to Monfalcone at the top of the Adriatic in 2011, and sailed down the Croatian coast to Corfu. She stayed there until 2014, cruising around the Ionian, before returning home to live in Cornwall. She was little used since then, but maintained in good condition and 2018 was sold to a new owner in the Netherlands.

For more details of the voyage see the skipper's blog.

See a video of a Yarmouth 23 under sail
boat.name: Freya
boat.short_description: 'Freya', a Yarmouth 23, was built in Yarmouth IOW, launched 2001. In 2011 she was taken to the Adriatic by road and sailed down the Dalmatian coast to Corfu, where she cruised until 2014 before returning to Cornwall.
